Summary: One red sphere flying east at a high rate of speed followed by another object of the same color and shape
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside at a relatives house enjoying the fireworks when looking North into the sky there was red glowing sphere moving really fast. At first there was one but soon after another object of the same shape and color was behind it. Both objects were heading East.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 4th 2012
